refnamediv.refpurpose: get the SSL_CTX from which an SSL is created

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_SSL_CTX() returns a pointer to the SSL_CTX object, from which ssl was created with SSL_new 3 .

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The pointer to the SSL_CTX object is returned.
